subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Over the last six weeks, center fielder Coco Crisp has hit 12 home runs and driven in 26 runs, while batting .293 with 5 stolen bases from his leadoff spot.
snippet: Over the last six weeks, center fielder Coco Crisp has hit 12 home runs and driven in 26 runs, while batting .293 with 5 stolen bases from his leadoff spot.
